Inspired by the outdoors, this cotton-blend crew neck keeps you warm from season to season. This staple item is perfect for active and casual days because of its comfortable fit and laid-back style. Columbia is renowned for our quality material and proprietary technology featured in our men’s apparel. This crew may seem simple, but its qualities pack a punch. Columbia’s crew pullover features a regular fit and super-soft fabric for comfortable everyday wear. Our signature logo is featured on the chest for subtle style. Whether you wear it to tackle a workout, or chose to wear it on a casual Sunday, you’ll remain stylish and comfortable. Columbia’s offer this crew in multiple sizes and colors. Extended sizing available. Regular Fit. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
Imported
LONG SLEEVE WARMTH: Columbia Men’s Hart Mountain II Crew is a long sleeve pullover that offers a cozy solution to year-round wear.
COTTON BLEND: Made from 60% cotton and 40% polyester this shirt is soft on the skin and offers all-day comfort.
VERSATILE LAYER: With a crew neckline, comfort ribbing at the cuff and hem, long sleeves, this pullover makes a cozy second layer.
SUBTLE STYLE: Nothing screams warm and comfy like this crew neck, leading with a subtle touch of pride featuring our signature Columbia logo on the chest.
BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching and craftsmanship. This is a long-lasting sweat-shirt you will enjoy for seasons to come.

Read more

The Columbia Men’s Hart Mountain II Crew sweater is crafted of 60% cotton and 40% polyester suede fleece for soft touch and ultimate warmth.

With a modern classic fit, this is a stylish sweatshirt, lightweight with an active design, that works with layering and great warmth.

With a crewneck and long sleeves, this Columbia men’s sweatshirt is designed to give you ultimate comfort during cold winter days.

Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our apparel apart from others. We use only the highest quality materials, expert craftsmanship, and durable stitching. This is a long-lasting garment you will enjoy for seasons to come.

OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture.
OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature’s elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.
WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Made for warm breathable comfort, these popular winter snow pants are made with advanced materials, designed to deliver alpine performance you’ll appreciate all day.
KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, snowmobiling, and other winter activities, our Powder Stash Snow Pants include bottom leg zips for better fit around your boots, with internal leg gaiters, and durable Hammerhead reinforced cuffs.
HANDY FEATURES: These snow pants include easy exterior waist adjustments, articulated knees, two cargo pockets, zippered hand pockets, jacket and pant connectors, leg venting for active sports and days with wild swings in temps.

item.title: Columbia Men’s Bugaboo IV Pant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Engineered for the active outdoor enthusiast, the Columbia Men’s Bugaboo II pants are the perfect blend of form, function, and practicality. Designed as a modern classic with universal fit for a comfortable range of motion, these men’s winter snow pants feature exterior adjustable waist tabs to snug your pants for ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $80.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:41:27 UTC – Details)


Engineered for the active outdoor enthusiast, the Columbia Men’s Bugaboo II pants are the perfect blend of form, function, and practicality. Designed as a modern classic with universal fit for a comfortable range of motion, these men’s winter snow pants feature exterior adjustable waist tabs to snug your pants for the perfect fit and reduce the potential of snow sneaking under the waistline. These outdoor pants have been designed for snow skiers, snowboarders, mountain climbers, and winter sports enthusiasts who are looking for comfortable, waterproof, breathable snow pant. Our Omni-HEAT thermal reflective dots regulate temperature, using space-blanket technology to reflect and retain your body heat, while still allowing a high level of breathability and interior airflow. Additional features, including internal leg gaiters, zippered hand pockets, and lower leg snap gussets, permit you to easily slip these pants over boots and wear insulated undergarments, keeping the snow out for maximum warmth and dryness. These men’s winter pants come in multiple colors and range of sizes. Available in extended sizing. Active and Regular Fit. To ensure you get the right size, please refer to our sizing chart. To measure the waist correctly, measure around your natural waistline, allowing the tape measure to sit comfortably. For the hips, measure around the fullest part of your hips. And for the correct inseam, measure from the top of the interior leg to the bottom of the ankle. Imported.  Shell: 100% nylon. Lining and insulation: 100% polyester.  Zippered closure.  Machine Wash.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 17 x 15 x 4 inches; 1 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1864311
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 20, 2019
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Columbia (Sporting Goods)
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07J6TDX1L

Button closure
Machine Wash
OMNI-HEAT: Our patented Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for outdoor performance. The interior lining consists of our metallic dot pattern designed to retain heat, while the breathable fabric dissipates moisture
OMNI-TECH: Our proprietary technology provides air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable, keeping mother nature’s elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe, keeping you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions
WATERPROOF SNOW PANTS: Made for warm breathable comfort, you can embrace fresh powder days in these ergonomic-fit snow pants built with thermal-reflective lining and synthetic insulation
KEEPS THE SNOW OUT: Perfect for skiing, snowboarding, and snowmobiling, our Bugaboo IV Pants are critically seam-sealed to keep water out, while you keep dry and well ventilated
HANDY FEATURES: Designed for the perfect fit, these snowboard pants include easy exterior waist adjustments, reinforced and articulated knees, a cargo pocket, zippered hand pockets, and lower leg snap gussets

These pants have light insulation to offer extra warmth along with the protection of a waterproof shell. With thoughtful details like an adjustable waist, internal leg gaiters, and zippered front hand pockets meet your mountain needs.

Read more

Perfect for skiers, snowboarders, and winter mountain climbers. Whether you’re a winter athlete or not, these advanced waterproof snow pants will keep you comfortable and dry in any weather.

These snow pant features a breathable, ventable, waterproof shell, combined with our heat-keeping reflective lining. These thermal reflective dots regulate temperature, using space-blanket technology to reflect and retain your body heat.

Engineered for easy exterior waist adjustments on the go, articulated knees offer a comfortable fit with a wide range of motion.

Designed with the elements you need, these snowboard pants feature zippered pockets to keep your gear secure, internal snow gaiters, and adjustable cuff-guards elevate a warm and dry experience.

Read more

Omni-Heat | Thermal Reflective Warmth

Magic in a little silver dot that reflects body heat. Omni-Heat Reflective garments are the ultimate body heat management system for performance in the outdoors. The metallic dot patterns are designed to retain heat, while the rest of the lining consists of highly breathable fabric that dissipates moisture and excess heat.

Omni-Tech | Waterproof & Breathable

Air-permeable protection that’s waterproof and breathable. This proprietary technology provides excellent waterproof protection, keeping mother nature's elements out, at the same time allowing the inside to breathe. The result is outerwear that keeps you dry and comfortable no matter the conditions.

item.title: Columbia Men’s Terminal Tackle Long Sleeve Shirt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) WIth Collegiate flair, the polyester interlock construction of our PFG Terminal Tackle Long Sleeve Shirt offers full coverage against harmful midday sun with UPF 50 protection. It showcases your college spirit. It’s lightweight and quick drying, making it the perfect solution for staying cool while protecting your skin out over ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.25
(as of Nov 30,2022 03:49:52 UTC – Details)


WIth Collegiate flair, the polyester interlock construction of our PFG Terminal Tackle Long Sleeve Shirt offers full coverage against harmful midday sun with UPF 50 protection. It showcases your college spirit. It’s lightweight and quick drying, making it the perfect solution for staying cool while protecting your skin out over any highly reflective water. The ultimate day-out-in-the-sun staple. This technology featured long sleeve is necessity for events on the ocean, lake, river, or campus side. Made up of a combination of Columbia’s signature protection fabrics: UPF 50 works to block and shield you from harmful UVA and UVB sun rays known to cause skin damage, while the advanced wicking fabric works to pull moisture and water away from the skin. You remain cool while our signature PFG logo runs along the sleeve. Columbia offers this fishing shirt with a range of college logos and in a variety of sizes. Regular Fit. To ensure the size you choose is right, utilize our sizing chart and the following measurement instructions: For the sleeves, start at the center back of your neck and measure across the shoulder and down to the sleeve. If you come up with a partial number, round up to the next even number. For the chest, measure at the fullest part of the chest, under the armpits and over the shoulder blades, keeping the tape measure firm and level.
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 14.29 x 10.94 x 1.46 inches; 7.05 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 1892211
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 4, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Columbia
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B07ZZSH5YC

Imported
Pull On closure
OMNI-SHADE: Be safe and protected. Omni-Shade blocks UVA and UVB rays to help prevent sunburns and long-term skin damage. The tight weave construction with UV absorbent yarns block the full spectrum of harmful UV rays
OMNI-WICK: The ultimate moisture management technology for the outdoors. Omni-Wick quickly moves moisture from the skin into the fabric where it spreads across the surface to quickly evaporate—keeping you cool and your clothing dry
ADVANCED PROTECTION: The Columbia Men’s PFG Terminal Tackle Long Sleeve Shirt guards against sun damage thanks to the built-in UPF 50 material. It’s a breathable, quick wicking fabric that pulls moisture away to keep you cool and dry
PFG COMFORT & BREATHABILITY: Made from a polyester interlock quick-dry material, this fishing shirt is right at home on the water
CLASSIC FIT: This long sleeve Tee Shirt is designed for classic fit, built for ultimate comfortability in any adventure
